comments.body: We should probably mention above that out of range offsets will be adjusted to the log start and log end offsets. For example, if the log end offset is 10 and the offset after shifting is 15, then we will actually commit offset 10. Similarly for the other options.
Added a general note at the end of this section.

  • --shift-by <Long: number-of-offsets> : Reset offsets shifting current offset by 'n', where 'n' can be positive or negative.
